lines.text: Enter AGAMEMNON, AJAX, MENELAUS, NESTOR, DIOMEDES, and others, marching. Shouts within

lines.speaker: agamemnon
lines.text: Hark! hark! what shout is that

lines.speaker: nestor
lines.text: Peace, drums! Achilles! Achilles! Hectors slain! Achilles.

lines.speaker: diomedes
lines.text: The bruit is, Hectors slain, and by Achilles.

lines.speaker: ajax
lines.text: If it be so, yet bragless let it be Great Hector was a man as good as he.

lines.speaker: agamemnon
lines.text: March patiently along: let one be sent To pray Achilles see us at our tent. If in his death the gods have us befriended, Great Troy is ours, and our sharp wars are ended.
